FILE: cm002680v11.0.txt
DYAD: USA - YEMEN PEOPLES REPUBLIC(S.)
RIVALRY: RIV96
DISPUTE(S): MID3613 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190527
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190527

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3613 

TERRMID: MID3613 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID3613 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3613 1 -- third party link to territorial MID 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3613 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID3613 from Associated Press 12/5/1982, in 1982, the US conducted military exercises with Oman off the coast of Oman, near the Yemen People's Republic (South Yemen). Yemen People's Republic protested, triggering this MID. Yemen People's Republic was engaged in a rivalry with Oman over a border dispute and because Oman routinely attacked rebels in YPR territory. This is coded third party link to territorial MID because the YPR protested the military actions of the US, who was cooperating with Oman — with which YPR had a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID3613 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3613 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3613 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3613 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3613 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3613 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARLINK: MID3613 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3613 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID3613 there was some civil conflict in Oman occurring at the time, but there is no indication in news coverage of this MID that there was a connection to militarized rebels in Oman. This was localized to the territorial issue. 

COUPMID: MID3613 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3613 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3613 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3613 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:
South Yemen severed diplomatic relations with the United States on October 24, 1969.

SOURCES-CM: 
*Middle East Journal *(MEJ), Winter 1969.

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

By ALY MAHMOUD, Associated Press Writer. "U.S. Troops Conduct Exercises in Oman". The Associated Press, December 5, 1982, Sunday, AM cycle. https://advance-lexis-com.proxy-remote.galib.uga.edu/api/document?collection=news&id=urn:contentItem:3SJ4-DFJ0-0011-54VY-00000-00&context=1516831. Accessed May 27, 2019.
